name: Psychose
detailed_description:
Psychose is an indie horror game, focused on the psychological horror.
Survive and complete the objectives to escape you.

Synopsis :


After a serious accident that cost the life of his little girl.
John lost all contact with reality, get yourself trapped.
He must find a way to escape from here before going crazy, unless he is already.

Gameplay :


Try the experience Psychose, escape from this school in which you play John.
Complete the objectives without getting caught by the master of the place.

Settings menu will be available to adjust certain parameters such as controls or the graphics.
It is strongly recommended to play with the defaults parameters to enjoy a better gaming experience.

We also recommend playing with a headphones and to turn off the lights of the room where you are.

/!\ The game is still in the early stages of development /!\
If you encounter problems that may troubles the game experience please let us know.

short_description: Try the new experience Psychose horror game. Escape from this school in which you play John. Complete the objectives without getting caught by the master of the place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 32-bit & 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on low quality and without shaders.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 32-bit & 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on low quality and without shaders.
